Module dunemasking
Package dunemask.util.internal

Class DMRW

  • java.lang.Object
    • dunemask.util.internal.DMRW
  • public class DMRW
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads And Writes Files

    Write One Line of Text: RW.write(File, String, int)

    Write Multiple Lines of Text: dunemask.util.RW#write(File, String[], int)

    Read One Line of Text From File: dunemask.util.RW#read(File, int)

    Read Lines from File: dunemask.util.RW#read(File, int, int)

    Reads all lines from File: dunemask.util.RW#readAll(File)

    Author:
    Elijah Dunemask
